This game has now been reviewed to within an inch of it's (half) life...
So I will not step too heavy on roads already well trodden.
This game is as solid as they come and deserves to be in any Steam gamer's collection.
It also opens up a whole universe of creativity with mods, so it really is tremendous value for money.
Summed up in two words? GET IT!

Half life alyx is a prequel to half life 2, set 5 years before HL2. It is also set 15 years after Half-Life 1. 15+5=20. 4,548 days passed between the release of Half-Life 2 Episode 2 and Half-Life Alyx. 4,548/20 is 227.4, rounded down to 227. Half-Life 1 has 18 chapters. 227/18 is 12.63, rounded up to 13. Half-Life 2 takes 15 hours to beat on average. 13+15=28. Half-Life Alyx also takes around 15 hours to beat. 28+15=43. Alyx will be the seventh major Half-Life game in the series. 43-7=36. Originally, Half-Life 2: Episode 1 was going to be called Half-Life 2: Aftermath. "Episode1" has 8 characters, while "Aftermath" has nine. 9+8=17. Taking 36 from earlier, 36-17=19. Half-Life Alyx can be considered Half-Life 1.75 since it takes place 75% of the way between Half-Life 1 and 2. 19√ó0.75 is 14.25, rounded down to 14. There are 2 episodes to follow-up Half-Life 2. 14/2=7. Including the two Gearbox-made expansions for Half-Life 1, there have been 7 Half-Life games released for pc. 7/7=1. Hunt Down The Freeman is a fan made Half-Life game, and it has 18 letters in its name. 18+1=19. 37% of HDTF's reviews are positive, which means that 63% of them are negative. 19+63=72. Half-Life 1 was released in 1998, which we will abbreviate as 98. 72-98=-26. The absolute value of -26 is 26. Black Mesa is another fan made Half-Life game, and it has 9 letters in its name. 26-9=17. 95% of the reviews for BM on steam are positive. 95% of 17 is 16.15, rounded down to 16. Half-Life 2: Deathmatch is the multiplayer mode of Half-Life 2. Deathmatch has 10 letters. 16-10=6. 97% of Half-Life 2's steam reviews are positive, meaning 3% are negative. 6-3=3. 

Half-Life 3 Confirmed.
